void MIDI_DeInit (void)
 Deinitialize the MIDI peripheral registers to their default reset values.

void MIDI_StructInit (MIDI_InitTypeDef *MIDI_InitStruct)
 Fill each MIDI_InitStruct member with its default value.

Function Documentation

void MIDI_CHAN ( HT_MIDI_TypeDef *  MIDIx,
MIDI_CHAN_ST_Enum  TRIG_ST,
MIDI_CHAN_VM_Enum  TRIG_VM,
MIDI_CHAN_FR_Enum  TRIG_FR,
u8  CHx 
)

Configure the Channel for the selected MIDI.

Parameters:
MIDIx,:where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
TRIG_ST,:this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
TRIG_VM,:this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
TRIG_FR,:this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
CHx,:specify selected channel of the MIDI.
Return values:
None

void MIDI_ClearFlag ( HT_MIDI_TypeDef *  MIDIx,
u32  MIDI_Flag 
)

Clear the specified MIDI flag.

Parameters:
MIDIx,:where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
MIDI_Flag,:specify the flag that is to be cleared. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • MIDI_INTF : MIDI INTF
Return values:
None

void MIDI_CTRL ( HT_MIDI_TypeDef *  MIDIx,
MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN3_Enum  MCUCHEN3,
MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN2_Enum  MCUCHEN2,
MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN1_Enum  MCUCHEN1,
MIDI_CTRL_MCUCHEN0_Enum  MCUCHEN0,
u8  DACDS,
MIDI_CTRL_MUSICEN_Enum  MUSICEN,
MIDI_CTRL_SPIRDEN_Enum  SPIRDEN,
MIDI_CTRL_SPIDISLOOP_Enum  SPIDISLOOP,
MIDI_CTRL_CHS_Enum  CHS 
)

Configure the Channel for the selected MIDI.

Parameters:
MIDIx,:where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
MCUCHEN3,:this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
MCUCHEN2,:this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
MCUCHEN1,:this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
MCUCHEN0,:this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
DACDS,:specify the clipping and distorting volume of the MIDI.
MUSICEN,:this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
SPIRDEN,:this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
SPIDISLOOP,:this parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
CHS,:specify channel selection of the MIDI.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 598 of file ht32f5xxxx_midi.c.

FlagStatus MIDI_GetFlagStatus ( HT_MIDI_TypeDef *  MIDIx,
u32  MIDI_Flag 
)

Check whether the specified MIDI flag has been set or not.

Parameters:
MIDIx,:where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
MIDI_Flag,:specify the flag that is to be check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • MIDI_INTF : MIDI int flag
Return values:
Thenew state of MIDI_Flag (SET or RESET).

Definition at line 316 of file ht32f5xxxx_midi.c.

void MIDI_Init ( HT_MIDI_TypeDef *  MIDIx,
MIDI_InitTypeDef *  MIDI_InitStruct 
)

Initialize the MIDIx peripheral according to the specified parameters in the MIDI_InitStruct.

Parameters:
MIDIx,:where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
MIDI_InitStruct,:pointer to a MIDI_InitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the specified MIDI peripheral.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 168 of file ht32f5xxxx_midi.c.

void MIDI_IntConfig ( HT_MIDI_TypeDef *  MIDIx,
u32  MIDI_Int,
ControlStatus  NewState 
)

Enable or Disable the specified MIDI interrupt.

Parameters:
MIDIx,:where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
MIDI_Int,:specify if the MIDI interrupt source to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • MIDIO_DMAEN : MIDIO DMAEN
  • MIDII_DMAEN : MIDII DMAEN
  • MIDI_INTEN : MIDI INTEN
NewState,:new state of the MIDI interrupts. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 291 of file ht32f5xxxx_midi.c.

void MIDI_MCUCH0 ( HT_MIDI_TypeDef *  MIDIx,
u16  CH0B,
u16  CH0A 
)

Configure the MCU CH0 DATA for the selected MIDI.

Parameters:
MIDIx,:where MIDIx is the selected MIDI from the MIDI peripherals.
CH0B,:specify DATA[31:16] of MCU CH0 of the MIDI.
CH0A,:specify DATA[15:0] of MCU CH0 of the MIDI.
Return values:
None
